title: Capybara Clicker Pro

headings.text: How to Play Capybara Clicker Pro

controls: Tap on the Capybara to earn coins.
content.howToPlay: The gameplay is simple. Tap on the Capybara to get coins. You can increase your earnings per second or click by purchasing the boosters on the right. As you earn more coins, you will be able to unlock more characters. You can see these wonderful characters by hitting the t-shirt icon at the top of the game screen.

fullContent: Homeâ€º ClickerCapybara Clicker ProBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenCapybara Clicker Pro is an idle clicker game in which you tap on the adorable Capybara to collect Capybara coins. Increase the number of coins you make by clicking on the cute animal every second and every click to achieve more significant figures! The goal of this game is to tap and earn coins. As you progress, you'll also be able to unlock new great characters!How to Play Capybara Clicker ProThe gameplay is simple. Tap on the Capybara to get coins. You can increase your earnings per second or click by purchasing the boosters on the right. As you earn more coins, you will be able to unlock more characters. You can see these wonderful characters by hitting the t-shirt icon at the top of the game screen.Boosters in CapybaraOn the right side of the screen, you'll notice boosters stacked one on top of the other. You must invest your Capybara coins here in order for the game to advance. These boosts will significantly assist you in raising your revenue.Earn +100 capybaras per click with the Professional Clicker!Make +200 capybaras every second using the Robot.Glitch Clicker booster gives you an extra +1000 capybaras for every click you make.The Factory booster will add +5000 capybaras to your idle coins every second.Cute Capybara CharactersAs you go through the game, you will unlock new Capybara characters. They're all sweeter than the last! These lovely critters can be found by clicking on the t-shirt icon. You can find the following characters here.CapycornKapybaruCapyboredCamobaraCosmic CapybaraWeather ConditionsDid you know that you can change the weather conditions of the Capybara? You can see the weather conditions you can unlock by clicking the cloud icon at the top of the screen. It is possible to see rainy, snowy, sunny and even starry weather here!The Pink BarWhen you earn many coins by clicking on the Capybara repeatedly, a pink bar appears in the lower left corner. When you fill this bar completely, you earn twice the coins you would normally earn.ControlsTap on the Capybara to earn coins.Other Idle GamesIf you like Capybara Clicker Pro, you might also like Cookie Tap, in which you manufacture your own cookies with the help of Cookie Grandma. You can also seek up more idle games on OnlineGames.io to get additional game options. If you stay connected, you will constantly find new, exciting idle games!Embed URL:https://www.onlinegames.io/games/2023/q2/capybara-clicker-pro/index.htmlThis article was updated on February 13, 20241 Player2DAnimalClickerCuteEmbeddableEndlessFreeHTML5IdleMobileMouse
